title: Crispy Shanghai prawns
ingredients: ['100ml vegetable oil', '400g prawns with shells on, heads removed', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '20g root ginger, sliced', '1 spring onion, white and green parts separated and sliced into 3cm pieces', '4 teaspoons sugar', '2 tablespoons white wine', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons vinegar']
